org.apache.logging.log4j.core.config.plugins.validation.constraints

Annotation Type ValidPort


  • @Documented
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value={FIELD,PARAMETER})
 @Constraint(value=ValidPortValidator.class)
public @interface ValidPort
    Indicates that a plugin attribute must be a valid port number. A valid port number is an integer between 0 and 65535.
    Since:
    2.8

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      String message
      The message to be logged if this constraint is violated.

    • Element Detail

      • message

        public abstract String message
        The message to be logged if this constraint is violated. This should normally be overridden.
        Default:
        "The port number is invalid"
